name: XTHRUST
description:
XTHRUST - Rocket Drone Racing

Simple Controls - Hard to Master

Fly your rocket drone in round based multiplayer races and single player challenges.
Beat the best times, gain XP with spectacular flying and win races to earn coins.
Race through a growing range of maps and upgrade your rocket drone.

  • Single Player:
    • Tutorial
    • Time Trial Missions
    • Global Ranking Leaderboards
    • Special Achievements

  • Multiplayer:
    • Time Trial Race Maps
    • Gem Hunt
    • Global Ranking Leaderboards
    • Advanced Spectator Mode
    • Best Time Ghosts (personal best, next best, world record)

  • Global:
    • Custom Drone Upgrades
    • Difficulty Classes (beginner, amateur, casual, pro, master)
    • XP, Coins and Levels
    • Steam Achievements
